TITLE: AI-Enhanced Information Curation
DEF: Using AI for identifying, collecting, and organizing information
TASK: AI-enhanced resource curation leverages artificial intelligence to improve the process of identifying, collecting, and organizing educational materials. The main purpose of this pattern is to efficiently discover and present high-quality resources tailored to the needs of learners and instructors. This is achieved by using AI algorithms to analyze user preferences, learning objectives, and context, in order to recommend relevant resources and maintain an up-to-date collection.
